text: Hey kids!
Guess who's here
Yes it's me Bob..
Join me for learning street with Bob.
Hey kids.
Why so glum?
Tomorrow is the fancy dress show and we don’t know what to wear.
I have a brilliant idea!

Something colourful, something bright
And they make for a healthy bite
They are vegetables, don’t you know
In the gardens you’ll find they grow
Hop on all you kids, let’s go together
Learn something new with each other
This is a lesson mixed with fun
It’s even better under the sun
Look at those tomatoes, lush and red
They are being taken into a shed
Delightful costume they will make Polly, it’s all yours to take.
Potatoes potatoes, they love to hide under the soil they sit with pride
Johnny, you can take this one it will fit you snug as a bun
Check these carrots, orange and long
A lot of goodness they bring along
They are roots, but tasty to eat jack, get one around your feet
Hey!
Green and nutritious, Spinach is great
Look at these lovely bunches in the crate
Mary, get your energy from these
A lovely costume they make with ease
Bye bye!
I wonder what's on the other side.
Oh my my, what a lovely cabbage patch one of the healthiest vegetables in the batch
Its layers of leaf make for a yummy meal Jill, you just got yourself a good deal

Onions and Aubergines, kales and more
Vegetables, they can never be a bore
Now that we have everything we need
Let’s all hurry up, get up to speed
Are you ready kids?
Thank you so much for helping us Bob!
Our costumes are the best!
I'm just happy to know that you loved learning about vegetables.
Vegetables are the best!
I hope you kids had a blast getting to know all the different vegetables.
Hope to see you for another great lesson!
Till then, ciao! .
